## Source: ossf-package-analysis (34de70c9a9c01b43d1728b2a20d6eada0fe0a1e925866f4546057dc5fb7aa737)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'badge-ruler' @ 0.0.2 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
